actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.
Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice. Approved for full committee consideration without amendment without recommendation.
Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 967.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A resolution to refer S.1762 entitled "A bill for the relief of the Menominee Indian tribe of Wisconsin" to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers S. 1762, a bill for the relief of a Wisconsin Indian tribe, to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.

titles.title: A resolution to refer S.1762 entitled "A bill for the relief of the Menominee Indian tribe of Wisconsin" to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.
